text: Do I really need this item?
subText: If you don’t have walking shoes, then yes!  If you do, then no unless you’re wanting to get another pair for sports, for example.

text: How would this item improve my day-to-day life?
subText: Walking shoes are great to stay fit, healthy, and mobile.

text: Why am I really buying this item? Is it because of my peers? Is it because of an ad? Is it because of my own understanding of my needs?
subText: Generally, walking shoes are an essential item because walking is good for our well-being.

text: Is this item stockable? Do I really need this item?
subText: Ofcourse! And yes, it’s better to walk using walking shoes than sandals!
A good quality pair of walking shoes would cost anywhere between $40 to $60. But you don't need to spend more than $100 unless you’re buying for sports, but the item would be different then!
